sentences.en: Calls unanswered, deliveries are late an assembly line can't operate.
sentences.cn: 电话无人接听 、 货物晚到、或是组装线无法运作.

sentences.en: Crucial questions remain unanswered, above all on loan pricing.
sentences.cn: 仍有一些关键问题尚未得到解答, 首先就是贷款定价问题.

sentences.en: Forgive me for leaving some of your questions unanswered.
sentences.cn: 请原谅,你有几个问题我没回答.

sentences.en: I handed over my test paper, leaving the last question unanswered.
sentences.cn: 我?回答最后一道试题就交了试卷.

sentences.en: It is unscholarly and derivative, and raises a lot of unanswered questions.
sentences.cn: 它不象学者所写而且是摹仿的, 并且提出很多不能解答的问题.
还有许多其他问题没有得到解答。

sentences.en: More tears are shed over answeared prayed than unanswered ones.
sentences.cn: 为了祈祷成真所掉的泪,远比祈祷未能成真的更多.

sentences.en: More tears are shed over answered prayers than unanswered ones.
sentences.cn: 我也只是一般人类而已.

sentences.en: The consultant was a man who had many unanswered questions.
sentences.cn: 这个男性咨询者有许多待解的问题.

sentences.en: The consultant was a mi n who had many unanswered questions.
sentences.cn: 这个4827?性咨询者有许多待解的问题.

sentences.en: The question is in abeyance, ie left unanswered , eg until more information is obtained.
sentences.cn: 这个问题暂时搁置(如待获得更多资料时再行解决).

sentences.en: This is a fundamental unanswered question, but it is not easily susceptible to experimental investigation.
sentences.cn: 这是个带根本性的尚未解答的问题, 可是又很难用实验来检验.

sentences.en: Through an unfortunate oversight your letter was left unanswered.
sentences.cn: 由于令人遗憾的疏忽,未能给你回信.

sentences.en: Were there unanswered questions and directions for future research?
sentences.cn: 是否有未有答案的问题和将来研究的方向?

sentences.en: What causes unconvincing results of CBEM in declining regions is still unanswered.
sentences.cn: 什么仍然引起倾斜的区域CBEM的不使人信服结果是无回答的.

sentences.en: Why just the Jewish capitalists and not the others an unanswered question.
sentences.cn: 为何只针对犹太资本家呢?这是个未有解答的问题.

trans.tran_cn: 未予答复的，无反应的，无回报的
trans.tran_en: an unanswered question has not been answered
